metadata.name: CuddlySalmon – 🍷⚔️🔥
metadata.description:
*This work of collaborative AI art can be experienced in immersive 360º on a VR headset.*

🍷⚔️🔥 is a piece of AI art inspired by [@CozomoMedici](https://twitter.com/CozomoMedici), whose work in tirelessly championing the digital arts has had a huge impact on the artist's own journey in web3.

CuddlySalmon blurs the lines between physical and digital, creating pieces of AI art meant to be experienced in multiple dimensions. During the creative process, CuddlySalmon collaborates closely with various AI systems, including powerful language models like GPT-3 and ChatGPT, to co-create the final artistic output. They view themselves as partners with these systems in the artistic process.

CuddlySalmon's journey in AI art began in 2015 with the release of Google's DeepDream, and they have been exploring latent space ever since. Their innovative use of technology and unique perspective leads to thought-provoking works of art that challenge traditional art forms.
